overview: A beginner-friendly roadmap to get started with frontend development. Covers the fundamentals required to build static and dynamic websites.

steps.title: HTML Basics
steps.description: Learn structure of web pages, semantic elements, forms, tables.

steps.title: CSS Fundamentals
steps.description: Learn styling, selectors, box model, positioning, flexbox, and grid.

steps.title: JavaScript Basics
steps.description: Understand variables, data types, loops, functions, DOM manipulation.

steps.title: Version Control (Git & GitHub)
steps.description: Learn Git basics, commits, branches, pull requests.

steps.title: Responsive Web Design
steps.description: Learn media queries, mobile-first design, accessibility basics.

steps.title: Basic Project
steps.description: Build a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
